tool_description: An API showing the latest news about climate change as reported by newspapers around the world.
name: Climate Change Now
title: Climate Change Now

api_list.name: Get News from an Individual News Source
api_list.description: This endpoint returns Climate Change news from a specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-now.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-now.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-now.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-now.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about Climate Change from all over the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-now.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-now.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
